name: An Errand
description:
An Errand is a one-shot RPG Adventure.

Play time approx. 1-2 Hours.

You play as Ezra, a farmer, who is tasked with saving his villages mill after its damaged one night. 

On your adventure you will:

- Explore the world around you.

- Fight wild monsters.

- Meet the people of Circaster and its surrounding country.

The game was made over six weeks to start learning about Game Development using just the default tools supplied in RPG Maker MV.   If you would like to leave some feedback in the comments feel free. I would recommend downloading the game for free as it is quite short but if you enjoy it and would like to see more from me please consider donating after you complete it!

And if you would like to see more content/patches for the game or more work from me in the future tell me about that in the comments too!
